events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund.
The case has been categorized under Refund due to customer's request for money back.
Assigning customer support agent Emma to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! I’m Emma from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and explain the reason for the refund in more detail?
My order number is 123456789. The item arrived damaged and does not match the description on the website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can process a full refund upon receiving the returned item. Would you like us to send you a prepaid return label?
Yes, please send the return label. I want to return the product and get my money back as soon as possible.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the returned product, the refund will be processed immediately.
Just following up to confirm you received the return label and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
